solution_line_template: Four pounds of coffee cost ${coffee_price_per_pound} x {coffee_pounds} = $<<{coffee_pounds}*{coffee_price_per_pound}={cost_of_coffee}>>{cost_of_coffee}.
Two gallons of milk cost ${milk_price_per_gallon} x {milk_gallons} = $<<{milk_price_per_gallon}*{milk_gallons}={cost_of_milk}>>{cost_of_milk}.
